description: Try our easy to follow Mini Pork Meatballs In Spiced Tomato Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Pork Meatballs In Spiced Tomato Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Put the minced pork, onion, capers, olives, and flour in a mixing bowl, add the egg, and season with salt and black pepper. Mix thoroughly, using your hands, then form into 12-15 2cm balls.
Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meatballs for 8-10 minutes, or until golden brown. Transfer to a baking dish and put to one side.

Meanwhile, put the tomatoes, garlic, and paprika in a pan, season with salt and black pepper, then cook over a medium heat for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour the tomato sauce over the meatballs and bake in the oven for 20 minutes. Serve hot.
